price: O you who believe, be patient and endure[93], stand on guard[94][95] and fear Allah, so that you may be successful.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱصۡبِرُواْ وَصَابِرُواْ وَرَابِطُواْ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes:
[93] In the face of life’s trials and tribulations.
 [94] When you face your enemy in battle.
 [95] Rābitū from ribāt, i.e., the fact of ‘tying up’ one’s war steed at outposts to protect the borders from enemy attack.
